name: Japanese School Life
summary: Welcomed by the fluttering of cherry blossom, the main character, Brian, starts a new high school life in Japan. Brian soon starts to get along with two girls in the same class after they start to talk to him. With their help, Brian gradually learns Japanese culture and customs.
info:
• 中文名: 日式校园
  • 发行: Sekai Project
  • 人物设定: ぴこぴこぐらむ

  • 游玩人数: 1
